content:
I’m grateful for the testimonies from today’s witnesses at today's HELP Committee hearing on paid leave because it remains a major barrier to equal pay for equal work.

There is no excuse for our nation’s failure to support working families with paid leave policies. We must ensure equal pay for equal work.

HELP.SENATE.GOV
Paid Leave for Working Families: Examining Access, Options, and Impacts | The U.S. Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor & Pensions
name: Robert P. Casey, Jr.
text: im grateful testimonies todays witnesses todays help committee hearing paid leave remains major barrier equal pay equal workthere excuse nations failure support working families paid leave policies must ensure equal pay equal workhelpsenategovpaid leave working families examining access options impacts us senate committee health education labor pensions

content:
Even as China commits horrific human rights violations against the Uyghurs and pro-democracy activists in Hong Kong, they’re set to host the 2022 Olympics.

As chair of the Congressional-Executive Commission on China, I’m co-leading a hearing today on how the U.S. can ensure that the Olympics are a spotlight on China's genocide and human rights abuses, not a propaganda coup.

CECC.GOV
China, Genocide and the Olympics | Congressional-Executive Commission on China
name: Jeff Merkley
text: even china commits horrific human rights violations uyghurs prodemocracy activists hong kong theyre set host olympicsas chair congressionalexecutive commission china im coleading hearing today us ensure olympics spotlight chinas genocide human rights abuses propaganda coupceccgovchina genocide olympics congressionalexecutive commission china

content:
GOOD NEWS: Families can now watch their kids play sports outside.

Outdoor exercise is just about the healthiest thing that can be done, pandemic or not. And watching your kids play a sport is one of the great joys of life, so we’re thankful for this change. I’m looking forward to additional announcements about ocean sports.

STARADVERTISER.COM
Spectators now allowed at Oahu outdoor sporting events
name: Brian Schatz
text: good news families watch kids play sports outsideoutdoor exercise healthiest thing done pandemic watching kids play sport one great joys life thankful change im looking forward additional announcements ocean sportsstaradvertisercomspectators allowed oahu outdoor sporting events
